servicetypes.name: Check & Tune
servicetypes.details: For a Check & Tune service our mechanic gives your bike a thorough once over, checking the brakes, gears and tyres for wear and damage - so you can have peace of mind that your bike will ride smoothly and safely.
specifications: Brakes and gears checked for damage and wear and adjusted
Tyres checked for damage and wear and re-inflated

servicetypes.name: General bike Service
servicetypes.details: A General Service includes a thorough clean and de-grease, leaving your bike looking and running like new.
specifications: All services in the Check & Tune service, plus:
Tyres checked for damage and wear and re-inflated

servicetypes.name: FULL BIKE SERVICE
servicetypes.details: Whether you ride MTB or Road, we recommend a Full Service at least once a year to keep you bike running at its best.
specifications: All services in the General Service, plus:
Headset removed and refitted with fresh grease
Wheel hubs checked for damage and wear and adjusted
